I got a email saying I got $500 of ad credit, how do I use it?

That's awesome! To redeem your $500 ad credit, you'll need to create an account on NewsBreak if you haven't already. Once you're logged in, you can add the ad credit to your account under the Prepay option. For detailed step-by-step instructions, you can check out this guide: [How to redeem a NewsBreak ad credit](https://help.newsbreak.com/hc/en-us/articles/17391456255629-How-to-redeem-a-NewsBreak-ad-credit). If you have any other questions, feel free to ask!

The Prepay option can be found in the Billing Section of your NewsBreak Ad Manager account. Here's how you can access it:
1. Log in to your NewsBreak Ad Manager account.
2. Navigate to the Billing Section.
3. Under Ad Credits, click on ‘Add ad credits.’
4. Choose ‘Customize’ and enter the total value of your gifted ad credit, plus at least $1.
For more details, you can refer to this guide: [How to redeem a NewsBreak ad credit](https://help.newsbreak.com/hc/en-us/articles/17391456255629-How-to-redeem-a-NewsBreak-ad-credit). Let me know if you need any further assistance!
when i push "add ad credits" it says this... Please go to our Help Center to submit a ticket to apply for the "Add Ad Credits" feature first. Only account admin can add ad credits.

It looks like you need to apply for the 'Add Ad Credits' feature first. Please go to our Help Center and submit a ticket requesting this feature. Make sure that you are logged in as the account admin, as only account admins can add ad credits. If you need further assistance, feel free to email adsupport@newsbreak.com.
